issue.name: Workshop on Systems and Architectures for Computer Assisted Interventions (SACAI)
issue.short_description:
The goal of this workshop is to provide a forum for sharing developments in systems and architectures for
computer assisted intervention (CAI) applications. This workshop was offered for six consecutive years at
MICCAI 2008-2013 and focused on open interfaces, interoperability, and standards.

We propose to reinstitute this successful workshop series for MICCAI 2016, with renewed focus on these topics and highlighting recent developments in open source, shared research platforms.
